info.title: PrimeForge CRM API
info.description:
The PrimeForge CRM Service provides comprehensive customer relationship management capabilities for the PrimeForge platform.

## Features
- Customer management
- Lead tracking and conversion
- Sales pipeline management
- Contact management
- Opportunity tracking
- Account management
- Activity logging
- Sales analytics

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the access token in the Authorization header:
`Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>`

## Rate Limiting
- General endpoints: 100 requests per minute per user
- Admin endpoints: 50 requests per minute per admin user

## Multi-tenancy
This service supports multi-tenancy. The tenant context is automatically extracted from the JWT token.
